reference.shortdesc: A category element specifies any category by which a topic might be classified for retrieval or navigation.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Topics can belong to multiple categories. Such classifications are likely to come from an enumerated or hierarchical set. For example, the categories could be used to group topics in a generated navigation bar.
This element is equivalent to both the Coverage element and the Subject element in Dublin Core.
